Example Documentation

This page demonstrates the various features available in your documentation system.

Code Examples

JavaScript

function greet(name) {
  return `Hello, ${name}!`;
}

console.log(greet('World'));

Python

def greet(name):
    return f"Hello, {name}!"

print(greet("World"))

CSS

.container {
  max-width: 1200px;
  margin: 0 auto;
  padding: 2rem;
}
